price: 3. Waxaanu tusnay jidka ama waa mid mahad naqa ama mid abaal dhac badan (gaal ah).
arabic: إِنَّا هَدَيۡنَٰهُ ٱلسَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرٗا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: innā hadaynāhu al-sabīla immā shākiran wa-immā kafūran
